item.title: vForum Online Spring 2020
item.description: A few days ago VMware announced that VMworld will be online due to the current situation with COVID-19. Review the VMworld FAQs. Therefore, as there will be only one big online event during the week of September 28, 2020. So, why not attend a free mini-VMworldin less than a month?That’s vForum Online!vForum Online is a LIVE virtual eventwhere you can access it directly from any device. Obviously there’s no travel required, so why not engage with more people and learn about new trends, features, and technologies?
